title: Episode 119: Sam Tripoli & The Ghost of Lee
itunes:title: Episode 119: Sam Tripoli & The Ghost of Lee
description: Sam is a young Christian warrior and a nastymouth. We talk salami sex, heteroflexibility, controlled hallucinations, scarecrow’s ass, and selling icecream in the 1950s.
